_source.text: (9) If you really need a Hollywood image of what these creatures are like you can do no better than to rent a video of William Dieterle's 1941 classic The Devil and Daniel Webster (Edward Arnold, Walter Huston), and watch how Mr. Scratch operates.

text: (9) If you really need a Hollywood image of what these creatures are like you can do no **better** **than** to
rent a video of **William** Dieterle's 1941 classic The Devil and **Daniel** Webster (Edward Arnold, Walter Huston), and watch how Mr. Scratch operates.
